summary: Horker Bows, Crossbow, Arrows+Bolts and Quiver. 3 versions with various dmg values each, improveable and craftable at forge (misc)
descriptionHtml:
[center]I've quit modding and moved on to social work and game programming.
As a final gift: [b] ALL MY ASSETS ARE FREE TO USE[/b]
For further details and constraints, please check out the board thread:
[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1779275-time-to-say-good-bye-and-a-little-gift/]http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1779275-time-to-say-good-bye-and-a-little-gift[/url]
Cheerio and keep on playing![/center]

[b][size=4]Horker Bow and Arrows[/b][/size]
improveable, craftable at forge (misc) - user requested mod.

[youtube]qJ7AKIrB4tM[/youtube]

... interested in more Horker weapons? Follow my WIP project:
[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1242297-ghosu-horker-weapon-pack-wip/]http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1242297-ghosu-horker-weapon-pack-wip/[/url]

[b]Update History:[/b]
1.0 - Horker Bow and Arrows, 3 dmg versions each
1.01 - Now compatible with Horker Tusk texture replacer like [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/47956/]THIS[/url]
1.1 - Old bow model in 3 dmg versions added (user request)
1.2 - Horker Quiver added

- Horker Crossbow, Bolts and Quiver out now! Dawnguard required, standalone mod.


[img]http://666kb.com/i/cjkgypyr56vp5lqgy.jpg[/img]
old model

[img]http://666kb.com/i/cjmg52g3jmhbwod3u.jpg[/img]
new model and quiver

[img]http://666kb.com/i/cjmi0ab9jxbtrx4ka.png[/img]
optional file: quiver replacer

[img]http://666kb.com/i/cjo1x3wo208qycq3l.png[/img]
1.01 - slightly overhauled model




[img]http://666kb.com/i/cjvjepvwo94w8dgsl.jpg[/img]
[b]HORKER WEAPON PACK OUT NOW:[/b] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48557/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48557/[/url]


greetings
Ghosu
author: Ghosu
